auth.patientDescription: Access AI-powered mental health support, mood tracking, and therapy sessions.
auth.clinicianDescription: Manage patients, access analytics, and provide enhanced care with AI insights.

mood.title: Mood Tracking
mood.notesPlaceholder: How are you feeling? What's on your mind?
mood.selectTriggers: What might have influenced your mood today?

goals.title: Goals
goals.createFirstGoal: Create your first goal to track progress
goals.taskGoalDescription: Finish at least 4 tasks per week
goals.breakLargeTasks: Break large tasks into smaller steps
goals.setSpecificTimes: Set specific times for task completion
goals.trackMoodDaily: Track your mood daily for one week
goals.deepBreathing: Practice deep breathing for 5 minutes daily
goals.completeThreeTasks: Complete at least 3 assigned tasks this week
goals.walkWhenStressed: Take a 10-minute walk when feeling stressed
goals.writePositiveThing: Write down one positive thing each day

moodInsightsDescription: Track your mood patterns, view insights, and monitor your emotional well-being
moodTrendDescription: Your mood has been {{trend}} this week with an average of {{average}}/10.
startLoggingMood: Start logging your mood to see personalized insights here.
consistentTrackingMessage: Great job maintaining consistent mood tracking! This helps us provide better insights.
dailyLoggingRecommendation: Try to log your mood daily for more accurate patterns and personalized recommendations.
wellnessGoalsDescription: Setting and tracking wellness goals can help improve your mental health journey.
basedOnMonthEntries: Based on {{count}} mood entries this month
basedOnLastEntries: Based on your last {{count}} mood entries
dailyPracticeDescription: Try to log your mood at the same time each day to build a consistent habit and get more accurate insights.
mindfulnessDescription: Take a few minutes each day for mindfulness or deep breathing exercises to help manage stress and improve mood.
stayConnectedDescription: Regular communication with your support network and healthcare providers is key to maintaining good mental health.

marketplace.title: Psychologist Marketplace

marketplace.upgradeMessage: Currently you don't have the plan needed. Upgrade it for just $5USD!
marketplace.existingClinician: You already have an assigned psychologist
marketplace.additionalSessions: You can still book additional sessions with other professionals from the marketplace
marketplace.noClinician: You currently have no assigned psychologist. Explore our marketplace to find the ideal professional
marketplace.adjustFilters: Try adjusting your search filters to find more results
